page.title: 09CARNFORTH LEISURE PURSUITS
page.content: From 475 replies to a questionaire on leisure activities the following popularity chart was compiled:- MEN WOMEN BOYS GIRLS 1 Walking Reading Swimming Swimming 2 Reading Walk/Jog Football T.V. 3 Garden Sew/Knit T.V. Reading 4 Swimming Garden Reading Walk/Jog 5 T.V. Swimming Cycling Dancing 6 Cycling Cycling Walk/Jog Drawing 7 Photog. T.V. Cricket Clubs 8 Snooker Badmint. Computer Knitting 9 Fishing Driving Snooker Cycling 10 D.I.Y. Keep-Fit Crafts Music Altogether 57 men's activities, 32 women's activities, 24 boys' activities and 35 girls' activities were listed. Most popular activities were:-{Walking 55, Swimming 54, {Reading 48, T.V. 35, Gardening 30 and {Cycling 23.} Unemployment trends in Carnforth have increased leisure time.
